channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Microsoft blogs

item.title: Gpresult Like Tool For Intune
item.description: Hi, Jonas here! Or as we say in the north of Germany: "Moin Moin!" I had to troubleshoot a lot of Intune policies lately and I used a variety of tools for that.At the end, I built my own script to have a result which looks similar to what “GPresult /h” creates for on-premises group polices.The script is inspired by the following article: https://doitpshway.com/get-a-better-intune-policy-report-part-2 by Ondrej Sebela.It follows a similar approach, but without any module dependencies and fewer output options, as my script only generates an HTML page.What started as a script is now a module whic...
